main event: A witness observed four luminous objects moving rapidly through the sky at approximately 1950 hours on November 24, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were white and luminous, about the size of a tennis ball.,The edges of the objects appeared fuzzy or blurred during rapid acceleration.,The objects abruptly disappeared after a slight increase in speed.,The witness was cleaning a car when they first noticed the objects moving northeast.,The report was submitted to the Office of Special Investigations of the U.S. Air Force.
witness description: The witness was a structural aircraft assembler, aged 43.
